publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4914 Mike Pringle: Free Maps for Schools—That the Parliament congratulates Ordnance Survey for its "Free Maps for 11-year-olds" initiative under which all P7 pupils at Scottish primary schools are entitled to a free local map; notes that in 2005 over 60,000 maps were issued to eligible schools in Scotland, raising awareness of local geography and aspects of citizenship, and encourages all Scottish primary schools to register with Ordnance Survey before the 31 October 2006 deadline to receive a free map for every pupil.

S2M-4914 Mike Pringle: Free Maps for Schools—That the Parliament congratulates Ordnance Survey for its "Free Maps for 11-year-olds" initiative under which all P7 pupils at Scottish primary schools are entitled to a free local map; notes that in 2005 over 60,000 maps were issued to eligible schools in Scotland, raising awareness of local geography and aspects of citizenship, and encourages all Scottish primary schools to register with Ordnance Survey before the 31 October 2006 deadline to receive a free map for every pupil.
S2M-4914 Free Maps for Schools (lodged on 4 October 2006) Murray Tosh*, Colin Fox*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4914 Free Maps for Schools (lodged on 4 October 2006) Margaret Smith*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Jim Wallace*, John Swinburne*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Euan Robson*, Patrick Harvie*
S2M-4914 Free Maps for Schools (lodged on 4 October 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Frances Curran*, Mr David Davidson*
S2M-4914 Free Maps for Schools (lodged on 4 October 2006) Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-4914 Free Maps for Schools (lodged on 4 October 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4914 Free Maps for Schools (lodged on 4 October 2006) Robin Harper*
S2M-4914 Free Maps for Schools (lodged on 4 October 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*
